prompt.input: write a 1-2 funny lines about grapefruit

sampled.completion:
1. 1. "Why did the grapefruit feel so left out? Because it's the only fruit that's not allowed to join SIAM (Society of Illuminating and Attractive Mangoes)."
2. "Why did the grapefruit become a musician? Because it already had a lot of 'citizen'!"
2. 1. "Why did the grapefruit feel so left out? Because it's always the tart of the party."
2. "I tried to eat a grapefruit with a fork, but it was too prickly."
3. 1. "I used to think grapefruit was just a weird fruit, but now I know it's a superhero in disguise."
2. "Why did the grapefruit refuse to be juiced? Because it didn't want to end up in a glass half-naked!"
4. 1. Why did the grapefruit feel so lonely? Because it was the only citrus not invited to the party.
2. I tried to eat a grapefruit at midnight, but it was a terrible idea. The pulp was too bright and the juice was too bitter. I ended up with a sour stomach and a glowing aura.

sampled:
All of the texts are related to grapefruit, but they differ in their content and structure. Some of them are puns, others are jokes, and some are personal experiences. All of the texts contain different words and phrases that make them unique.
